001package imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic;
002
003public abstract class PntUtils {
004        
005        public static Pnt2d centroid(Pnt2d[] pts) {
006                final int n = pts.length;
007                double sx = 0;
008                double sy = 0;
009                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
010                        sx = sx + pts[i].getX();
011                        sy = sy + pts[i].getY();
012                }
013                return Pnt2d.from(sx/n, sy/n);
014        }
015        
016}
